ValidationRule.description: Expiration Date required when Stage = Bind Order Sent or Delivered to Insured
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Endorsement", OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Bind Order Sent"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Delivered to Insured")), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATEVALUE("2023-08-24"), ISNULL( Tail_Expiration_Date__c ) )
